summary: Contoso Wireless offers a product that features a sleek design, powerful battery life, fast data speeds, 5-inch HD display, 13-megapixel rear camera, 4G LTE capabilities, 32GB of storage space, 2GB of RAM, and a 3,000 mAh battery. It also comes with pre-installed apps and is compatible with most major wireless carriers in the US as well as international networks. It includes a one-year limited warranty and an extended protection plan can be purchased for additional coverage.
